description.narrative: This activity (Climate Development Knowledge Network) is a component of Climate and Development Knowledge Network reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £35,465,940. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management, Environmental research. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, PwC. The start date is 21-12-2009 and the end date is 30-09-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
